channel.title: Noxrune 742 Loading RS3 | Divination | Grand Exchange | God Wars | Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://community.noxrune.com/uploads/monthly_2015_06/test.png.7f57fe724cd9333b79bece3043f57e7e.png[/img] [I]NoxRune is a 742 server loading present day data. Our goal is to best replicate pre-eoc combat mechanics with loads of new exciting content! NoxRune servers have been built from scratch utilizing the [URL=http://"http://netty.io"]Netty.io[/URL] library.[/I] [SIZE=5][FONT=Book Antiqua][url=http://noxrune.com]Home[/url] | [url=http://community.noxrune.com]Forums[/url] | [url=http://community.noxrune.com/index.php?/topic/494-features/]Features[/url] | [url=http://play.noxrune.com]Play Now[/url][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER] [B]Features[/B] - [SIZE=1]Here are just few of our several features that we'd like to point out![/SIZE] [ul][*]Endless amounts of monsters to slay! [*]Fully functional Prayers and [B]Curses[/B]. [*]Top of the line skilling, including 100% [B]Divination[/B] - Expect nothing but perfection! [*]Full lobby support with cross world communication. [*]Challenging [B]economy[/B] with realistic prices! [*]Fully functional cross world [B]Grand Exchange[/B]![/ul] [B]Selective Features[/B] - [SIZE=1]Here are features we have decided to introduce to the game, despite them not being part of the 742 client build.[/SIZE] [ul][*]Weapon & Shield sheathing [*]The option to choose between Legacy & RS3 stances. [*]The option to view a select set of items as their "retro" looks. [*]Updated maps, textures, npcs, and more![/ul] [I]We can go on and on, but why don't we just show you?[/I] [SPOILER=Images] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DOO0aS0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8m3lEo4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mi2jwmm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cX0qBuy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cRPEoDg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/b5cLrzr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CdHGDOV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bAtW6y9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KBZ6Dk6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pVJKCYi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TY0NHiT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XRoRUfP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jb51yqo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/et41iwN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hgGc3RT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p0qpfKB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lG9p5qd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/72d7fJs.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=GIFS] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/BrownGracefulIridescentshark.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/EcstaticOnlyHammerheadshark.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/ImpracticalPhonyGroundhog.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4r0nEEZ.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/ShadowySmoothDromedary.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/ShockingLeafyAntipodesgreenparakeet.gif[/img] [img]http://fat.gfycat.com/DefinitiveGracefulBustard.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/FlawlessNauticalAnhinga.gif[/img] [img]http://fat.gfycat.com/LameVillainousHamadryas.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/FlashyFemaleEarwig.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/IgnorantEnviousAndeancockoftherock.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/UniqueGreedyHerald.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/ShortBleakBasil.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/BoringPeskyAfghanhound.gif[/img] [img]http://giant.gfycat.com/GrouchyHopefulAfricanrockpython.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Player Testimonials]
[B]Counter: [/B]This server has endless possibilities - Henk 2k15
[B]Diggle: [/B]Whats not to like? Friendly community, stable eco and loads to do
[B]Tristam: [/B]really good job, best i've seen yet
[B]Instructions: [/B]One of the best private server I have ever played. BIG BUMP for this NOXRUNE!
[B]Psychoactive: [/B]I am playing this server for like three days now. And believe me this is one of the best server I have ever played in my entire life.
[/SPOILER] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"][B]Are you up for the challenge? Join NoxRune today![/B][/COLOR]

item.title: Noxrune 742 Loading RS3 | Divination | Grand Exchange | God Wars | Economy
item.dc:creator: @Noxrune Noxrune
item.description:
@Noxrune wrote:

[CENTER]

NoxRune is a 742 server loading present day data.
Our goal is to best replicate pre-eoc combat mechanics with loads of new exciting content!
NoxRune servers have been built from scratch utilizing the Netty.io library.

[SIZE=5][FONT=Book Antiqua]Home | Forums | Features | Play Now[/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]

Features - [SIZE=1]Here are just few of our several features that we’d like to point out![/SIZE]

[ul][]Endless amounts of monsters to slay!
[]Fully functional Prayers and Curses.
[]Top of the line skilling, including 100% Divination - Expect nothing but perfection!
[]Full lobby support with cross world communication.
[]Challenging economy with realistic prices!
[]Fully functional cross world Grand Exchange![/ul]

Selective Features - [SIZE=1]Here are features we have decided to introduce to the game, despite them not being part of the 742 client build.[/SIZE]

[ul][]Weapon & Shield sheathing
[]The option to choose between Legacy & RS3 stances.
[]The option to view a select set of items as their “retro” looks.
[]Updated maps, textures, npcs, and more![/ul]

We can go on and on, but why don’t we just show you?

[SPOILER=Images]

Mi2jwmm.png624×596

pVJKCYi.png765×504

XRoRUfP.png765×503

hgGc3RT.png1035×604

[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=GIFS]


[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Player Testimonials]

[B]Counter: [/B]This server has endless possibilities - Henk 2k15
[B]Diggle: [/B]Whats not to like? Friendly community, stable eco and loads to do
[B]Tristam: [/B]really good job, best i've seen yet
[B]Instructions: [/B]One of the best private server I have ever played. BIG BUMP for this NOXRUNE!
[B]Psychoactive: [/B]I am playing this server for like three days now. And believe me this is one of the best server I have ever played in my entire life.
[/SPOILER] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"][B]Are you up for the challenge? Join NoxRune today![/B][/COLOR]
